title: President Mahama urges African Leaders to fast-track continental financial institutions
desc: By: Celestine Avi and Seth Eyiah

title: Brazil's Pinheiro Braathen wins gold, and South America's first Winter Olympics medal
desc: Once a racer for Norway, Pinheiro Braathen switched to Brazil, his mother's home country. In winning the Olympic giant slalom on Saturday, he earned South America's first medal at a Winter Games.

title: 'Too soon' - Ella Toone set to miss Man Utd's League Cup final date with Chelsea as latest injury update also rules England star out of Lionesses first camp of 2026
desc: Lionesses star Ella Toone is "probably" going to miss Manchester United's League Cup final clash with Chelsea due to a hip injury, one also set to rule her out of England's first camp of 2026

title: The IOC’s ban of a Ukrainian athlete over his helmet reveals troubling double standards
desc: The IOC has failed, yet again, to be a global leader in the promotion of peace and human rights.

title: Dr Amoakohene, Kumasi Mayor visit Kotoko squad ahead of Hearts of Oak clash
desc: Ashanti Regional Minister Dr Frank Amoakohene and Kumasi Mayor Richard Ofori paid a visit to Asante Kotoko ahead of their high-stakes game against Accra Hearts of Oak on February 15, 2026.

title: Anthony Kim completes stunning comeback from golfing obscurity to win LIV Golf Adelaide
desc: 40-year-old American struggled with drug and alcohol addictions after his promising career went off the rails following injury

title: Arundhati Reddy, Renuka Thakur fuel India's DLS victory
desc: Sophie Molineux's tenure as Australia's new T20I captain got off to a forgettable start as her batting unit crumbled under relentless pressure

title: Italy's Mosca brothers on T20 World Cup, Andrea Bocelli, Mario Balotelli and facing England
desc: From meeting Mario Balotelli and Paolo Maldini to singing Andrea Bocelli and Ed Sheeran on the bus after their maiden T20 World Cup win, BBC Sport takes a look inside Italy's tournament.

title: DOH flags critical shortage of dentists nationwide
desc: A shortage of dentists in the Philippines has resulted in a wide gap between the number of practicing dental professionals and the country’s population, a health official said on Sunday.

title: 'Definite line of inquiry' into fatal Limerick crash
desc: Gardaí say they are following a definite line of inquiry following a three-car collision in Co Limerick, which claimed the life of a nurse who was on her way to work on Friday night.
